follow_up_sightings.note: Transit system report: Child seen at transit station wearing gray jacket and denim pants

narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 16-year-old female was last seen at Fairfax at 2025-09-28T01:06:26.493744+00:00. The child was reported missing by parent after failing to return home.
behavioral_patterns: left on foot toward nearby woods
entered vehicle and headed northbound on I-95
narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 4 hours of disappearance, movement cues walked through mall corridor into adjacent store suggest travel southbound along I-64. A white 2016 Jeep Grand Cherokee was observed departing near Fairfax, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 20 hours later, a neighbor reported someone matching the description (16-year-old female, wearing gray jacket, black leggings, white sneakers) near Rockingham.
witness_accounts.clothing: gray jacket, black leggings, white sneakers
witness_accounts.behavior: asking the child questions and offering a ride

news.title: Missing female child reported in Fairfax
news.excerpt: Authorities are searching for a 16-year-old female last seen in Fairfax, Virginia.

provenance._fulltext: A 16-year-old female was last seen at Fairfax at 2025-09-28T01:06:26.493744+00:00. The child was reported missing by parent after failing to return home. Within 4 hours of disappearance, movement cues walked through mall corridor into adjacent store suggest travel southbound along I-64. A white 2016 Jeep Grand Cherokee was observed departing near Fairfax, Virginia. Around 20 hours later, a neighbor reported someone matching the description (16-year-old female, wearing gray jacket, black leggings, white sneakers) near Rockingham.
